publication.title: Multiscale light-matter dynamics in quantum materials: from electrons to topological superlattices (ACM Gordon Bell Prize finalist)
publication.author: T. M. Razakh, T. Linker, Y. Luo, N. Piroozan, J. Pennycook, N. Kumar, A. Musaelian, A. Johansson, B. Kozinsky, R. K. Kalia, P. Vashishta, F. Shimojo, S. Hattori, K. Nomura, and A. Nakano
